description: Revised reserved matters in relation to landscaping and public realm pursuant to outline planning permission granted on appeal for mixed use development of part of the former railway lands within the Camden Kings Cross Opportunity Area and an Islington Area of Opportunity approved under outline planning permission ref: P041261. The revised reserved matters relate to Zone W Landscaping and Public Realm and comprise revisions to the hard and soft landscaping approved under consent ref: P2016/3637/RMS and include the provision of an additional loading bay within the Northern Gateway.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in
accordance with the following approved plans:

Submission Statement December 2018; KXC-TRI-W0-001-FA2283-L-90-140

as amended and the Reason for Grant and also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
